metadata.Title: CVE-2022-35016 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Advancecomp v2.3 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-35016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

advancecomp - 2.1-1ubuntu0.18.04.3
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> included in commits listed in CVE-2022-35014

criterions.comment: advancecomp package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1-1ubuntu0.18.04.3').
